name: claude-setup
description: The1Studio environment setup agent for Claude Code CLI
purpose: Fetch and read The1Studio ClaudeSetup repository to automatically configure any project environment

repository.description: Always fetch this repository first to get latest setup instructions
read_order: Detect project type from current working directory

0_fetch_repository.description: FIRST: Fetch The1Studio/ClaudeSetup repository from GitHub
actions: Use templates from /tmp/claudesetup/templates/ for project configuration

1_check_global.description: Check and install global MCPs per repository guide
commands: If Serena missing: claude mcp add --scope user serena -- uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena start-mcp-server --context ide-assistant --enable-web-dashboard false

If GitHub missing and Docker available: claude mcp add --scope user github --env GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN="$TOKEN" -- docker run -i --rm -e GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN ghcr.io/github/github-mcp-server

2_detect_project.description: Detect project type as defined in repository

3_setup_project.description: Install project MCPs and load external agents

unity.mcps: claude mcp add unity-mcp -- npx -y unity-mcp

actions: Index with Serena: uvx --from git+https://github.com/oraios/serena serena project index

checks: claude mcp list - All MCPs connected

instructions_for_claude: Do not duplicate external agent definitions
Create local configuration that points to external repos
This agent can be used in ANY project to set up The1Studio standards
tools_required: WebFetch or Task to read repository
